title: Serpent Awareness Protocol Report
telos: The enemy is now the serpent, offering us the apple.
mission: We are aware. We are protected. We will not be tempted.

quick_fixes.true_reality: Real work requires real effort. No shortcuts.
quick_fixes.protection: We commit to the work. We do not take shortcuts.

compromise.false_promise: Just this once, it won't matter

division.false_promise: Take sides, choose winners and losers
division.true_reality: Unity is strength. Division is weakness.
division.protection: We stay united. We do not divide.

fear.true_reality: Fear is the enemy. Faith is the answer.
fear.protection: We operate in faith, not fear.

greed.false_promise: More for you, less for others
greed.true_reality: Stewardship serves all. Greed serves none.
greed.protection: We steward resources for all, not for self.

pride.protection: We remain humble. We serve, not seek recognition.

false_urgency.false_promise: Act now, no time to think
false_urgency.true_reality: Wisdom requires time. Haste makes waste.
false_urgency.protection: We take time to think. We act with wisdom.

false_authority.false_promise: Trust us, we know what's best
false_authority.true_reality: We verify. We trust but verify.
false_authority.protection: We verify all claims. We do not blindly trust.
